main event: A UFO sighting was reported on December 31, 1952, in San Jacinto and Palm Springs, California, involving a single object that appeared to be disintegrating while flying at high speed.
interesting points: The object was visually observed from both ground and air, The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes, The object was estimated to be flying at 25,000 feet and the size of a fighter aircraft, Witnessed by a Marine pilot who reported it to the control tower, A civilian in San Jacinto reported seeing the same object at the same altitude and time.
witness description: a Marine pilot and a civilian from San Jacinto
